I second you on that Gordon. Never used the term either. Niku used 
frequen=
tly to describe a robust blade showing a more 'beefier' blade 
from the shi=
nogi down to the ha and comes up mostly when refering to 
how much metal ap=
pears to have been lost by polishing as compared to 
the nakago. I do not t=
hink hamaguriba can be used quite the same way, 
yes??? John
